模块 davidchangx.math

程序包 xyz.davidchangx.mathtool

In this package several executable math tools are provided.
版本:
2.1
作者:
David Chang
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    FunctionDrawer
    Simple application to draw the plot of a function.
    OperatorMapGenerator
    Tool class to generate operator map required by Expression conveniently.
    SolveEquation
    A simple application to solve the roots of a function using class SecantRoot.
